backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one-line summaries for key frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining colors, radii, and dark mode tokens for the app.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading Playfair Display font and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/deploy-marker.txt: Marker file indicating deployment timestamp and notes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering ValentineFlow inside a full-screen container.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page1Splas: Page 1 showing apology text with a Next button.
Page 2 showing the required centered text and a Next button.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page3Apolo: Page 3 showing extended apology text with a Next button.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page4Forgi: Page 4 showing forgiveness prompt with Yes button and evasive No button logic.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page5Final: Final page showing closing text and a single hugging GIF.
Simple wrapper applying enter/exit classes based on transition state.
frontend/src/components/ValentineFlow.ts: Manages 1–5 page flow with timed transitions using state and StageTransition.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for the dark romantic theme, base body styling, stage transition animations, and custom styles for text, buttons, and final GIF display.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root App component with global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, color variables mapped to CSS custom properties, extended radii, and animation/typography plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Vite’s node-side build, enabling ESNext modules, bundler resolution, and composite project support.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variable injection, path aliasing, dev server proxying, and optimized build output.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements and features for a 5‑page romantic apology site, including aesthetic rules, navigation flow, and image‑sourcing constraints.
